class.name: BulletType
class.brief_description: Appearance and behaviour data container for bullets.
class.description: Appearance and behaviour data container for bullets. Holds everything necessary to define what a bullet looks like, how it moves, and how it collides.

members.member: The collision mask associated with the type. Bullets currently ignore whether colliders are monitorable, so any objects on checked layers will always be detected.
The collision shape associated with the type.
The rate at which a bullet of this type will curve. Defined in degrees-per-second.
The amount of damage this bullet type can apply to a target.
If [code]true[/code], the bullet will rotate so that it faces the direction it is moving in.
The rate at which the bullet accelerates along its trajectory. Defined in pixels per second per second.
The material applied to this bullet type.
The amount bullets of this type will be scaled by. Uses a scalar float applied to both axis evenly.
The amplitude, in pixels, of the sin wave which determines a bullet's perpendicular displacement.
The frequency, in hz(? unsure), of the sin wave which determines a bullet's perpendicular displacement.
The initial speed associated with the bullet type.
The texture used to draw this bullet type.
